description: Avana Vetiver is a Vetiver System consultancy and nursery in Rarotonga, Cook Islands. It promotes the use of vetiver grass for typical bioengineering applications. Vetiver is a non invasive plant (seed sterile) that can be used for stabilisation, erosion control, surfacewater management and slope retaining. It can also be used for essential oil and handcrafts. The aim of Avana Vetiver is to pioneer the first experience of agroforestry in Rarotonga, Cook Island and help building a local sustainable food production system.
name: Avana Vetiver
